text: Ashok Gasti (1965 â€“ 17 September 2020) was an Indian politician and a lawyer. He was born in Raichur, Karnataka. He represented Karnataka in the Rajya Sabha for less than 3 months until his death in 2020. He was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Gasti died of COVID-19 on 17 September 2020 at a hospital near Udupi, Karnataka at the age of 55.BJP's Ashok Gasti, 1st-Time Rajya Sabha Member, Dies Due To COVID-19 ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in India Category:Indian lawyers Category:Politicians from Karnataka Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Ashok Gasti
